tool_description: Generates standardized data export packages for customer data requests with proper formatting and security controls.

data_locations.description: Data locations to include in export

classification_results.description: Data classification results from classification tool

export_format.description: Export format: JSON, CSV, XML, or PDF

encryption_required.description: Whether to encrypt the export package

delivery_method.description: Delivery method: secure_download, email, or api_endpoint

error_messages: Invalid export format: Use one of [JSON, CSV, XML, PDF].
Data extraction failed: Unable to extract data from one or more specified locations.
Encryption error: Failed to encrypt export package when encryption_required is true.
Invalid delivery method: Use one of [secure_download, email, api_endpoint].
Size limit exceeded: Export package exceeds maximum allowed size of 500MB.
usage: Provide customer_id, data_locations, and classification_results from previous tools. Specify export_format, encryption_required, include_audit_trail, and delivery_method as needed. Returns export package details and access information.

export_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated export package

package_size.description: Size of export package in bytes

record_count.description: Total number of records included in export

access_url.description: URL or method to access the export package
